001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.storage.encrypted_storage;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.SharedPreferences;
005import android.os.Handler;
006import android.util.Log;
007
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import androidx.biometric.BiometricManager;
010import androidx.biometric.BiometricPrompt;
011import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat;
012import androidx.core.util.Consumer;
013import androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity;
014import androidx.security.crypto.EncryptedSharedPreferences;
015import androidx.security.crypto.MasterKey;
016
017import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.R;
018
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.security.GeneralSecurityException;
021import java.util.Objects;
022import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
023
024import javax.inject.Singleton;
025
026@Singleton
027public class EncryptedStorageProviderImpl implements EncryptedStorageProvider {
028
029    public static final String TAG = EncryptedStorageProviderImpl.class.getCanonicalName();
030
031    private static final int DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION_VALIDITY_SECONDS = 3600;
032
033    @Override
034    public void getAuthenticatedPreferences(@NonNull final FragmentActivity fragmentActivity, @NonNull final String fileName, @NonNull final Consumer<SharedPreferences> resultHandler, @NonNull final Consumer<Throwable> errorHandler) {
035        getAuthenticatedPreferences(fragmentActivity, fileName, DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION_VALIDITY_SECONDS, resultHandler, errorHandler);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public void getPreferences(@NonNull final FragmentActivity fragmentActivity, @NonNull final String fileName, @NonNull final Consumer<SharedPreferences> resultHandler) {
040        resultHandler.accept(createPreferences(fragmentActivity, fileName));
041    }
042
043    private SharedPreferences createPreferences(@NonNull final FragmentActivity fragmentActivity, @NonNull final String fileName) {
044        return fragmentActivity.getApplicationContext().getSharedPreferences(fileName, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);
045    }
046
047    @SuppressWarnings("SameParameterValue")
048    private void getAuthenticatedPreferences(@NonNull final FragmentActivity fragmentActivity, @NonNull final String fileName, int userAuthenticationValidityDurationInSeconds, @NonNull final Consumer<SharedPreferences> resultHandler, @NonNull final Consumer<Throwable> errorHandler) {
049        final int authenticatorStatus = getAuthenticatorStatus(fragmentActivity.getApplicationContext());
050        if (authenticatorStatus != BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_SUCCESS) {
051            errorHandler.accept(new Exception("Strong/Weak Biometric authentication and/or Device password authentication is not available. Authenticator Status: " + getAuthenticatorStatus(authenticatorStatus)));
052            return;
053        }
054        new Handler(fragmentActivity.getMainLooper()).post(() ->
055                new BiometricPrompt(fragmentActivity, ContextCompat.getMainExecutor(fragmentActivity),
056                        getAuthCallback(() -> createEncryptedPreferences(fragmentActivity.getApplicationContext(), fileName, userAuthenticationValidityDurationInSeconds), resultHandler, errorHandler)).authenticate(getPromptInfo(fragmentActivity.getApplicationContext())));
057    }
058
059    private BiometricPrompt.PromptInfo getPromptInfo(@NonNull final Context context) {
060        return new BiometricPrompt.PromptInfo.Builder().setTitle(context.getString(R.string.auth_prompt_message))
061                .setAllowedAuthenticators(BiometricManager.Authenticators.DEVICE_CREDENTIAL | BiometricManager.Authenticators.BIOMETRIC_WEAK | BiometricManager.Authenticators.BIOMETRIC_STRONG)
062                .build();
063    }
064
065    private <T> BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback getAuthCallback(@NonNull final Callable<T> onAuthSuccess, @NonNull final Consumer<T> resultConsumer, @NonNull final Consumer<Throwable> errorHandler) {
066        return new BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback() {
067            @Override
068            public void onAuthenticationError(int errorCode, @NonNull CharSequence errString) {
069                super.onAuthenticationError(errorCode, errString);
070                errorHandler.accept(new Exception("Authentication Failed with code: " + errorCode + ", error message: " + errString));
071            }
072
073            @Override
074            public void onAuthenticationSucceeded(@NonNull BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationResult result) {
075                super.onAuthenticationSucceeded(result);
076                try {
077                    resultConsumer.accept(onAuthSuccess.call());
078                } catch (Exception e) {
079                    Log.e(TAG, "Error executing Auth Success callable.", e);
080                    errorHandler.accept(new Exception("Failed to create encrypted storage.", e));
081                }
082            }
083        };
084    }
085
086    private int getAuthenticatorStatus(Context context) {
087        BiometricManager biometricManager = BiometricManager.from(Objects.requireNonNull(context));
088        return biometricManager.canAuthenticate(BiometricManager.Authenticators.DEVICE_CREDENTIAL | BiometricManager.Authenticators.BIOMETRIC_WEAK | BiometricManager.Authenticators.BIOMETRIC_STRONG);
089    }
090
091    private String getAuthenticatorStatus(int status) {
092        switch (status) {
093            case BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_SUCCESS:
094                return "BIOMETRIC_SUCCESS";
095            case BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_ERROR_HW_UNAVAILABLE:
096                return "BIOMETRIC_ERROR_HW_UNAVAILABLE";
097            case BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_ERROR_NO_HARDWARE:
098                return "BIOMETRIC_ERROR_NO_HARDWARE";
099            case BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_ERROR_SECURITY_UPDATE_REQUIRED:
100                return "BIOMETRIC_ERROR_SECURITY_UPDATE_REQUIRED";
101            case BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED:
102                return "BIOMETRIC_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED";
103            case BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_STATUS_UNKNOWN:
104                return "BIOMETRIC_STATUS_UNKNOWN";
105            case BiometricManager.BIOMETRIC_ERROR_NONE_ENROLLED:
106                return "BIOMETRIC_ERROR_NONE_ENROLLED";
107            default:
108                return "Unknown value: " + status;
109        }
110    }
111
112    private SharedPreferences createEncryptedPreferences(Context context, @NonNull final String fileName, int userAuthenticationValidityDurationInSeconds) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException {
113        final MasterKey masterKey = CryptoUtil.getMasterKey(context, userAuthenticationValidityDurationInSeconds);
114        return EncryptedSharedPreferences.create(Objects.requireNonNull(context), fileName, masterKey, EncryptedSharedPreferences.PrefKeyEncryptionScheme.AES256_SIV, EncryptedSharedPreferences.PrefValueEncryptionScheme.AES256_GCM);
115    }
116
117}
